definition: owed or owing as a debt
examples: is due a full week's pay

definition: owed or owing as a natural or moral right
examples: finally got the recognition she was due
give credit where credit is due
everyone's right to dissent … is due the full protection of the Constitution

definition: according to accepted notions or procedures : appropriate
satisfying or capable of satisfying a need, obligation, or duty : adequate

examples: this advance is partly due to a few men of genius

definition: having reached the date at which payment is required : payable
required or expected in the prescribed, normal, or logical course of events : scheduled, expected to give birth
examples: The train is due at noon.
has a friend who is due in April

definition: something due (see due entry 1) or owed: such as
something that rightfully belongs to one
a payment or obligation required by law or custom : debt
